ygData.subject: RE: Dark Forge Bracer
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe...rather confrontational aren t we =) it s generally safe to reason that all armor of one type will be the same color, bronze, steel, rubi, mithril,
ygData.messageBody:
hehe...rather confrontational aren't we =)

it's generally safe to reason that all armor of one type will be the same
color, bronze, steel, rubi, mithril, umbral etc...so it would be *quite* odd
(and ugly) for darkforge to end up with a black bp and red bracers. though i
could see if the color/textures varied by race...troll as opposed to
whatever race your other friend is.

-kg

btw - this thingy here '=)' is generally used to convey sarcasm or jest,
something which should not be taken literally.

>From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu <countess_bathory_69@...>
>Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Dark Forge Bracer
>Date: Tue, 19 Oct 1999 12:26:32 -0700 (PDT)
>
>I posted both.
>Both items were received by friends. The BP stats and
>what it looks like were sent thru a /tell to us right
>after he got it.
>The Bracer i have seen on a friend personally.
>
>And who ever said it was all going to be the same
>color?
>
>If you see differently then post your own SS.
>Unfortunately the friend with the BP destroyed it
>since he already has Umbral before i could get a SS
>from him.
>
>
>--- Krukhan Garabash <krukhan@...> wrote:
> > ack....red.
> >
> > makes you wonder about whoever it was who posted
> > that 18 ac, +10 sta, black
> > color stuff about the bp (on one of the forums, with
> > no ss mind you, was
> > reposted here too)...hmmmmmm.
> >
> > i for one hope you are lying and/or colorblind =)
> >
> > rubi is hideous.
> >
> > -kg
> >
> >
